SELECT a.article_id, a.article_name, a.read_count, t.tag_name, c.cata_name, a.`enable`, a.update_time FROM article a, cata c, tag t, tag_article ta WHERE a.cata_id = c.cata_id AND ta.article_id = a.article_id AND t.tag_id = ta.tag_id
AND a.article_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{articleName}),'%')
AND c.cata_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{cataName}),'%')
AND t.tag_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tagName}),'%')
and a.`enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=CHAR}
